data.title: Wow what a Diamond uncovered
data.text: My friends and I stayed here for 4 days. We throughly enjoyed ourselves. The room was nice and spacious.  they had free breakfast which was yummy 😋. The front desk guy rodrigo made us feel welcome. Free cookies and complimentary water when we first arrived.  I ordered from Amazon prime now and they delivered our items to our door which was unexpected. Best western was located in a great area not to far from movies food and great shopping places. Thank you Best western plus avita. Awesome service.

owner_response.author: TexanAngel, Director of Sales at BEST WESTERN PLUS Avita Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello & Thank you for your VERY POSSITIVE review!

We are delighted you and your friends enjoyed your visit with us, found our rooms to be spacious and  our complimentary award winning breakfast buffet "yummy".
We appreciate your comments regarding our service & will share your motivational input with our Team Members, especially Rodrigo our Guest Services Manager.  Rodrigo and all our Team Members are one of the primary reasons BW Plus Avita Suites has been #1 Hotel on Trip Advisor for 6 consecutive years.

Glad you found our location to be in a GREAT area!  Thank you again for your favorable review and for staying with us.  Hope you and your friends will come back and visit us soon :)!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: great place to stay forovernight
data.text: loved the place, like a mini suite. I loved it, and the breakfast was good. The room was cozy, and the bed was firm, I like that. The convenience to all of the eateries, as well as the large mall. very nice.!

owner_response.author: TexanAngel, Director of Sales at BEST WESTERN PLUS Avita Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hello and thank you for your review - We are pleased you loved our hotel and enjoyed the breakfast - please come back and visit us again soon -
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good for Business
data.text: We stayed at the BWA hotel in a week for our technical business tour.  We had to leave at the hotel at 9:30 am and come back around 6:00 pm every day.  Therefore, it was required for us to have comfortable space and time during our stay in the hotel.  The BWA hotel gave us a wonderful space and time.

owner_response.author: TexanAngel, Director of Sales at BEST WESTERN PLUS Avita Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hello and thank you for your review - we are delighted you enjoyed your stay.  Please come back and visit us soon -
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice Hotel in Torrance
data.text: Room was very nice and clean, everything worked, easy access.  The bed was a little soft for my liking.  Easy check in and out.  Breakfast room a nice touch made it easy in the morning.  Plenty of parking some inside but need to be a tad early to get those spots.  Recommend this location

owner_response.author: TexanAngel, Director of Sales at BEST WESTERN PLUS Avita Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello and thank you for your favorable review :)! 

We are glad you found your stay satisfactory and check-in check out was easy, and enjoyed the breakfast room / breakfast which was nice and convenient. Also, thank you for mentioning our ample parking. We appreciate your recommendation of the Best Western Plus Avita Suites Torrance as a nice hotel in Torrance and a good place to stay.
Recommendations and reviews such as yours has made us the #1 hotel on TripAdvisor out of 20 hotels in Torrance for 6 consecutive years.

Warmest regards -
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very impressed.
data.text:
Upsides are a staff that is absolutely fantastic. Very welcoming and helpful. Rooms are modern and clean with nice beds.
Downsides? Can't think of one. Maybe the room could be a bit bigger, and king sized beds would be nice.
We'll  have no qualms staying there again.

owner_response.author: TexanAngel, Director of Sales at BEST WESTERN PLUS Avita Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello and thank you for your positive review :)!

We appreciate your wonderful comments regarding our Team Members - we will share these with them. Our Team is one of the reasons Best Western Plus Avita Suites Torrance has been named #1 hotel on TripAdvisor out of 20 hotels in Torrance for 6 consecutive years.

We look forward to having you come back and visit us again - soon!

Warmest regards -
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: MODERN, FRIENDLY STAFF
data.text: Hotel exceeded my expectations!  Room was spacious, bathroom clean w/walk in shower with seat and Bath & Body products.  Did not eat breakfast BUT went to the breakfast room to get coffee and they have a Starbucks machine!  Very high tech...you can program anything from regular coffee to cappuccinos, lattes, hot chocolate, etc.  VERY COOL!  We only stayed for two nights visiting family in the area but I wish we could've stayed longer.  The Del Amo Mall is about 5 minutes away.

owner_response.author: TexanAngel, Director of Sales at BEST WESTERN PLUS Avita Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello and thank you for yur positive review,

We are pleased yur stay with us exceeded your expectations and that you found our rooms spacious and clean. Glad you enjoyed our upgraded amenities package offering Bath & Body Products. We are delighted you enjoyed our Starbuck machine and were able to select the coffee of your choice.

We look forward to seeing you again soon - thank you for the review and for the business -
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very Impressed
data.text: This hotel was clean, the breakfast was excellent and the room was very nice. A little small but it was perfect for our short stay. It is centrally located to shopping. We will definitely stay here again.

owner_response.author: TexanAngel, Director of Sales at BEST WESTERN PLUS Avita Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello and thank you for your review,

We are glad you were impressed with our hotel and found our breakfast to be excellent.
We are conveniently located to shopping, the beach, restaurants, bars, cafes and night life. Please come back and visit us soon.

Thank you for the review and for the business -
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great stay
data.text: Very nice place, everything brand new.  Parking was excellent and staff was wonderful.  When I explained I was checking out 4:30am, Allan at the front desk wrote a note so the day staff would provide me with a On the Go snack since I will miss breakfast.  Very thoughtful.

owner_response.author: TexanAngel, Director of Sales at BEST WESTERN PLUS Avita Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello and thank you for your positive review - we appreciate it very much:)!

Glad you found our Team Members to be wonderful and our complimentary parking excellent. Thank you for mentioning Alan - We will share your review with our Team. Glad they took care of you and had an On The Go snack ready for you when you checked out at 4:30am. Helps make the very early morning easier.

Our Team Members are one of the reasons we have been #1 on TripAdvisor for 6 consecutive years out of 20 hotels in Torrance. We strive to offer all our guests a 5 Star Experience at An Exceptional value.

Thank you again for your review - please come back soon - we appreciate you and your business
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Exceeded my Expectations!
data.text:
Stayed here just overnight but I wish I would have stayed longer! This was the first Best Western I have tired and my expectations weren't very high to say to the least. When I arrived Rodrigo was juggling check ins and the phone but as soon as he had a chance he gave us his attention! 

The room was a lot bigger than expected and the beds were the best hotel beds I ever stayed in. Trust me I stay in a lot of hotels for work. The shower and toilet room was a little small but I wasnt spending a lot of time there. They had laundry that was was reasonably priced as well as a small fitness room. 

The breakfast was NOT just a small muffins and fruits breakfast. They had a large selection as well as a Starbucks coffee machine! So delicious! 

My short stay there was wonderful! Rodrigo always greeted us with a hello and he is one of the reasons I will return! That and the cookies and the room itself! :) such a great experience!

owner_response.author: TexanAngel, Director of Sales at BEST WESTERN PLUS Avita Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello,

We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and that your 1st experience at a Best Western Plus exceeded your expectations. Best Western Plus has been voted # 1 hotel in Business Today Magazine as the #1 Hotel Chain 3 stars for business travelers for two consecutive years. It has out performed Hiltons, Marriott's etc. in the 3 star level. This is the 1st time a chain has received this honor 2 consecutive years. We are honored to have been a part of this award!

Thank you for your accolades regarding Rigo - we appreciate it very much and will share these with him and the rest of the Team. Members such as Rigo are an important reason Best Western Plus Avita Suites Torrance has been #1 on TripAdvisor for 6 consecutive years out of 20 hotels in Torrance.

We are glad you enjoyed the delicious complimentary breakfast buffet and Starbucks Coffee Machine - it has been a BIG Hit with our guests. BW Plus Avita Suites Torrance has won Best Breakfast Western USA by Best Western International.

Thank you again for the review, and for the staying with us - please come back soon -
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Pleasant Stay
data.text: Return stay.  Once again, bedding and rooms clean and suite spacious.  Shower, vanity, clean and all in working order.  Breakfast area well-stocked, neat, clean.  Staff cordial, quick to keep tables clean.  Courtney at check-in and Tasha at check-out provided exemplary service.  Agree with other reviewers food odor somewhat permeated hall and elevators but not in our room.  Loud TVs and loud conversation from next room slightly audible but not bothersome.  One dissatisfaction is the rather loud and very cold A/C unit near one of the beds.  However, this can be easily remedied by carefully adjusting the ON/OFF and desired temperature while out of the room and prior to bedtime.  All in all, satisfactory stay and above-mentioned inconveniences is not a deterrent to stay in the property again.  Plus is five-minute drive to Del Amo Shopping Center with tenants Nordstrom, Kate Spade, etc. and also Sears and Marshall's.  Further down the road is Trader Joe's.

owner_response.author: TexanAngel, Director of Sales at BEST WESTERN PLUS Avita Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello and thank you for your kind review,

We are glad you enjoyed your stay and found the suite clean and spacious. Happy everything was to your satisfaction and that our Team Members provided exemplary customer service.

Please come back and visit us soo - thank you for staying with us
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very pleased, I'll return.
data.text:
I am very happy with my stay at this Best Western. My room was great.  It was nice having (free) breakfast every morning at my leisure.  My room was near the breakfast room so I'd run out and get a quick coffee before my shower, then a full breakfast an hour later. 
Front desk folks were very friendly, always greeted us and even called me the day of my arrival because the room was ready a little early.
Great location, easy free parking, fresh fruit in the lobby, a nice ambiance.
I will return again. 
The hotel was completely full every day I was there but I didn't have any problems with my room bring cleaned or check in/out.  

If you are a light sleeper I suggest you don't have a second floor room near the breakfast room. People are loud in the hallway on their way. 

I loved the second floor room not only for the nearby food, but the stairs were convenient so one flight up was the ice machine, candy and soda machines- one flight down and I was in the lobby.

owner_response.author: TexanAngel, Director of Sales at BEST WESTERN PLUS Avita Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello and thank you for your review -

We are happy you enjoyed your visit with us. Thank you for the kind words about our Team Members - w will share your comments with them.  Glad you enjoyed our parking, fresh fruit in the lobby and amenities.

Please come back and visit us soon -
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Displaced due to house flood
data.text: My son and I had to stay in a hotel due to a flood from the water heater. Either us did not want to leave the house school was about to start and I wanted the routine of home.The hotel was very clean and very nice helpful staff. Also the breakfast was very good.

owner_response.author: TexanAngel, Director of Sales at BEST WESTERN PLUS Avita Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello and thank you for your favorable response!

Hope all is well with your home now - please come back and visit with us soon - thank you for the review and for the business -
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Vacation Stay
data.text: Excellent staff and more than willing to accommodate an early check-in as needed to attend a family function.  Always willing to upgrade with my Platinum status. The location was perfect. Our stay was effortless.

owner_response.author: TexanAngel, Director of Sales at BEST WESTERN PLUS Avita Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello and thank you for your positive review -

We are delighted your stay was effortless - please come back and visit us soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Safe, comfortable
data.text: I needed a reasonably priced, safe place to say while visiting a friend in the nearby hospital. This fit the bill - my room was small (they called it a suite, which is a stretch), but as a woman traveling alone my #1 priority was safety. Indoor corridors are a must for me, and many of the motels and extended-stay places near the hospital were exterior access. Front desk staff was extremely nice and friendly, even bringing the water bottles he'd given me but that I'd forgotten up to my room a few minutes later.

owner_response.author: TexanAngel, Director of Sales at BEST WESTERN PLUS Avita Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello and Thank you for your positive review!
We are delighted you found the hotel safe and a great value. We will share your kind remarks with our Team Members and thank you for the favorable remarks regarding our staff and customer service. 
Thank you again for your review and please come back and visit us soon - Warmest regards
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very impressive BW Plus!
data.text: We saw some great reviews on BW and TripAdvisor which helped me choose your hotel, it was a great decision.  Clean hotel, great breakfast option and if you are a BW member you get a welcome goodies bag, what a nice touch!  Not sure who makes these wonderful decisions but its the little things that guest appreciate.  Ask for a room not facing the street if you like to sleep with open window.

data.title: Nice Surprise
data.text: Such a nice place. My room was just excellent; clean, modern and nicely appointed. My suite was very comfortable - however, the pillows were lame.  The staff was excellent. I had given up staying at Best Western motels and was a bit nervous when my company booked this for me. What a nice surprise!

owner_response.author: TexanAngel, Director of Sales at BEST WESTERN PLUS Avita Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello – Glad you enjoyed your stay with us and found the rooms to be excellent, spacious and comfortable. We appreciate your kind recognition of our Team Members – they work hard to make sure our Guests have a pleasant stay. 
Please come back and visit us soon- thank you for the review and for the business
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Thought this place was very nice!
data.text: Not sure about the bad reviews, but the room was spacious and not your average room design..felt like a little apartment.  Hotel was exceptionally clean, nicely decorated, and the breakfast was probably the BEST we have had in an under $200/night stay. The food was REAL and not mystery cafeteria grade. Don't hesitate to stop here if you are looking to get out of alas congestion on your way south of the city..it's very nice and quiet here.

owner_response.author: TexanAngel, Director of Sales at BEST WESTERN PLUS Avita Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello – Thank you for your review. We appreciate your input and are happy you enjoyed your stay with us. Gad you liked the décor and our complimentary breakfast buffet – we are pleased to share with you that BW Plus Avita Suites Torrance has won awards for BW as “Best Breakfast” for the western region of the USA. It is also one of the reasons we have been #1 Hotel on Trip Advisor for 6 consecutive years out of 20 in Torrance. 
Thank you again for the review and for the business. We appreciate it very much! Please come back and join us soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Average stay
data.text: The rooms are small and poorly planned. In some rooms, door of the washroom, when opened, literally touches the bed. The staff is not customer friendly. They always throw rules at you like you have to give your dry-cleaning by 8 AM or we will not deliver it the same day. Sometimes they took more than 2 days to deliver my clothes because one of the employees forgot to take them to dry cleaners. The internet in the room keeps disconnecting & has very poor connectivity in the corner rooms on 4th floor. Also, the breakfast spread is neither great nor tasty.

owner_response.author: BWASTORR, Director of Sales at BEST WESTERN PLUS Avita Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello and thank you for your review.  

We appreciate your input and will discuss at our next team meeting.  We are sorry your stay was not excellent and will look into your concerns / comments further. We were surprised to hear you did not find the staff friendly as one of the reasons we have been rates #1 on TripAdvisor out of 20 hotels in Torrance for 6 consecutive years is because of our GREAT Customer Service.  We do have a few new Team Members and will be sure to share your comments with all of the staff to make sure we are upholding this very important attribute.

Regarding our Breakfast Buffet (which is complimentary and included in the rate) we have won best breakfast buffet for all Best Westerns in the Western USA.  We offer a selection of pastries, bagels, breads, various flavored pancakes, waffles, selection of hot / cold cereals, Greek Yogurt with all the toppings i.e. fresh fruit / granola, eggs, hash browns and sausage with a nice selection of juices, coffees, teas, Miso soup and Green Tea.  Your review regarding breakfast is not a common one.

Our Internet which is a Premier Package is one of the fastest and most secured as compared to our competitors.   They too offer a Premier Package at a cost but ours is complimentary.  They just offer a basic Wi-Fi – premium is at a cost – so once again not our usual review with regard to the internet.

We thank you again for the review and for the business.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very bad customer services
data.text: I would not go to this hotel again.  I am a Diamond level member on the Best Western Award.   I received very poor customer service when I stayed at this hotel.  Compare to the other BW hotel that I stay in the area, I was very disappointed on my service.  When I checked in, I asked to use my Best Western Reward travel card - $50.  The clerk assured me that he entered this into the system.   When I checked out, I find out the full amount was charged.   I asked the clerk to fix the problem.   She said that she cannot and need a manager authority to fix it.   The manager was not available.  He will call me later and fix the problem.  The manager never called me.   I got the bill on the credit card on the full amount.   In hind site, how can the manager not be available at 12 noon?   It was a delaying tactic to ignore me.   I have cancel any further trip to this hotel.  What good is a a reward card if you cannot use it.  I am very disappointed on how they treat a "Diamond" level member.    I am very disappointed at the staff at this hotel and will never use it again.

owner_response.author: BWASTORR, Director of Sales at BEST WESTERN PLUS Avita Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello and Thank you for your review.  

We are sorry your visit was not excellent.  We have made a note of your complaint to further investigate into the situation and to bring it to our Team Members attention.  Poor Customer Service is a very rare comment for our hotel as we have a very dedicated and caring staff which has helped maintain the hotel as #1 on Trip Advisor for 6 consecutive years out of 20 hotels in Torrance. The hotel has a few new Guest Service Agents that may still not be up to speed with our service standards.  Please email me directly at day@avitasuitestorrance.com with your name, check-in date etc. and I will make sure our Guest Services Manager resolves your request and contacts you once it is done to let you know the situation was resolved.

Once again – apologize for the error made and we look forward to resolving the issue quickly.  Thank you for the review and for the business.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Stay and would recommend
data.text: Friendly, safe, convenient.  Tip: Go to the Breakfast that is offered early for best selection and quiet breakfast:)  Free parking and free breakfast was one of the reasons we chose to stay here.  We would stay here again if our plans take us to Torrence in the future.  Staff was very helpful and friendly and property is very clean.  Nice to be able to have free WiFi and print your own tix for the flight home.  Lots of movie channels too:)
